fields.name: Town Square
fields.description: You are in the town square. This is the central meeting place for the realm.

fields.name: Street
fields.description: You are in a small street. Litter is strewn about, and you see rats crawling in and out of the sewer grating.

fields.name: Training Room
fields.description: This is the training room. An aged guru stands here, practicing his arts. He says <reset>"If you are ready to advance, young fellow, you may <bold><yellow>train<reset> here."

fields.name: Bob's Weapon Shop
fields.description: Bob's Weapon Shop. You see lots of junk available to buy all over the room, and Bob grinning at you from behind a counter. He says <reset>"Please, come in, shop around, and take a glance at my <bold><yellow>list<reset>."

fields.name: Alley
fields.description: You're in a dark alley, where shadows obscure your view and hide dangerous things...

fields.name: Narrow Alley
fields.description: You're in a dark alley, where shadows obscure your view and hide dangerous things...

fields.name: Alley
fields.description: You're in a dark alley, where shadows obscure your view and hide dangerous things...

fields.name: Sloping Alley
fields.description: This sloping alley is on a large slant that leads down into a sewage trench.

fields.name: Sewage Trench
fields.description: You're in a disgusting sewage trench, with liquids containing things you don't want to know about flowing around your feet.

fields.name: Sewer
fields.description: You're in a disgusting sewage trench, with liquids containing things you don't want to know about flowing around your feet.

fields.name: Town Gates
fields.description: You're at the town gates, which lead into the dark forest.

fields.name: Dark Forest Entrance
fields.description: This is the entrance of the dark forest, where all sorts of strange noises emanate. You see a gate into town to the south.

fields.name: Dark Forest Path
fields.description: This is a small pathway, overgrown with shrubbery and foliage, winding through the dark forest.

fields.name: Dark Forest Path
fields.description: This is a small pathway, overgrown with shrubbery and foliage, winding through the dark forest.

fields.name: Alley Junction
fields.description: You're at a junction in the alley; it's barely visible here, but you can make out some small cages lying on the floor.

fields.name: Dark Forest Foliage
fields.description: You're in the heart of the forest, with thick foliage all over the place, obscuring many things.

fields.name: Samuels Armorsmith
fields.description: This is Samuels Armorsmith. You see Samuel busy working on some kind of metalwork, and when he notices you he says, <reset>"Hello, thanks for stopping by. I've got many things in my <bold><yellow>list<reset> you may be interested in."

fields.name: The Insane Alchemist's Workshop
fields.description: This is The Insane Alchemist's Workshop. Lots of beakers and test tubes litter the room, most filled with strange-looking liquids. A few of them look like they have exploded. The Mad Alchemist is busy pouring something into a beaker, but he takes the time to tell you, <reset>"Hello hello! I'm sure I've got something you need, just view my <bold><yellow>list<reset> and tell me what you want!"

fields.name: Deep Sewer
fields.description: You're in a deep and very dark portion of the sewers beneath town. Strange sloshing noises reach your ears, but you can't figure out what's causing them.

fields.name: Deep Sewer
fields.description: You're in a deep and very dark portion of the sewers beneath town. Strange sloshing noises reach your ears, but you can't figure out what's causing them.

fields.name: Sewer
fields.description: You're in dark portion of the sewers beneath town. Strange sloshing noises reach your ears, but you can't figure out what's causing them.

fields.name: Sewer
fields.description: You're in dark portion of the sewers beneath town. Strange sloshing noises reach your ears, but you can't figure out what's causing them.

fields.name: Sewage Trench
fields.description: You're in a sloping trench which leads downward into the sewers, and upwards onto an avenue in town.

fields.name: Sloping Bank
fields.description: You're in a sloping bank which leads down towards a sewage trench. The stench from the sewers reaches your nose from all the way up here.

fields.name: Avenue
fields.description: You're on an avenue running through the town.

fields.name: Avenue
fields.description: You're on an avenue running through the town.

fields.name: Avenue Intersection
fields.description: You're on an avenue running through the town. To the south you can see a trench running down into the sewers, and to the east you can see the beach.

fields.name: Boardwalk
fields.description: You're on an avenue running through the town. To the south you can see a trench running down into the sewers.

fields.name: Beach
fields.description: You're on a sandy beach, and you can see the ocean to the east, ponderously throwing water onto the sand. You can see a boardwalk to the west.

fields.name: Beach
fields.description: You're on a sandy beach, and you can see the ocean to the east, ponderously throwing water onto the sand.

fields.name: Beach
fields.description: You're on a sandy beach, and you can see the ocean to the east, ponderously throwing water onto the sand.

fields.name: Lobster Nest
fields.description: You're on a sandy beach, and you can see the ocean to the east, ponderously throwing water onto the sand. There's a large lobster nest here as well.

fields.name: Ocean
fields.description: You're in the ocean, and the water is making you cold. You can see the beach back to the west.

fields.name: Dark Forest Clearing
fields.description: You're in a clearing within the heart of the forest, with thick foliage all over the place, obscuring many things.

fields.name: The Freak Shop
fields.description: You're in a shop with a very strange looking man standing behind the counter. He gazes at you with one eye (you can't tell what the other one is doing) and screeches <reset>"Got anything good to sell me, sonny? The things I'm interested are right on this <bold><yellow>list<reset> here."

fields.name: Side Street Intersection
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street T-Junction
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street Dead End
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street Curve
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Side Street
fields.description: You're on a small street running between some buildings in town.

fields.name: Park Entrance
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. You can also hear birds chirping.

fields.name: Parkway
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. You can also hear birds chirping.

fields.name: Parkway
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. You can also hear birds chirping.

fields.name: Parkway
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. You can also hear birds chirping.

fields.name: Parkway
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. You can also hear birds chirping.

fields.name: Parkway Embankment
fields.description: You're in the town park, and you can see foliage all over the place. This is a sloped embankment that leads down into a sewage trench.

fields.name: Sewage Trench Incline
fields.description: You're on an cobblestone incline that leads upward to the city part, and downward towards the town sewage trench.

fields.name: Sewage Trench
fields.description: You're in a sewage trench, filled with all sorts of liquid refuse, slowly flowing eastward into the town sewers.

fields.name: Sewage Trench
fields.description: You're in a sewage trench, filled with all sorts of liquid refuse, slowly flowing eastward into the town sewers.

fields.name: Pier
fields.description: You're on a long wooden pier that streches out into the ocean. Seagulls can be seen flying around above you. You can see a small shanty to the south.

fields.name: Pier
fields.description: You're on a long wooden pier that streches out into the ocean. Seagulls can be seen flying around above you.

fields.name: Pier
fields.description: You're on a long wooden pier that streches out into the ocean. Seagulls can be seen flying around above you.

fields.name: Pier
fields.description: You're on a long wooden pier that streches out into the ocean. Seagulls can be seen flying around above you.

fields.name: Sea Shanty
fields.description: You're in a little sea shanty, where an old man with a glass eye and a hook for an arm stands, gazing off at something in the ocean. He acknowledges your presense by saying <reset>"Arrr maytee, the sea's be good this morn. I've many a thing ye may need to fight off them dern rogue shipmen on thee docks, just have a looksee at my <bold><yellow>list<reset> here."

fields.name: Hell
fields.description: You're in hell. You should have turned away when you had the chance, but no, you didn't. And now you're going to die. Have fun being dead.
